LanguageData.AK_ArmorRating_Magic.label: 護甲 - 法術
LanguageData.AK_ArmorRating_Magic.description: 對於法術型別傷害的抗性,法術傷害通常來自於術士和輔助幹員. 計算方式和原版一致.
LanguageData.AK_ArmorRating_Absolute.label: 護甲 - 真實
LanguageData.AK_ArmorRating_Absolute.description: 真實傷害極為罕見,僅極少幹員的技能可以造成. 沒有任何護甲可以抵禦此型別傷害.
LanguageData.AK_MagicDamageMultiplier.label: 法術傷害
LanguageData.AK_MagicDamageMultiplier.description: A multiplier on damage from Magic-type attacks for weapons made of this material.
LanguageData.AK_AbsoluteDamageMultiplier.label: 真實傷害
LanguageData.AK_AbsoluteDamageMultiplier.description: A multiplier on damage from Absolute-type attacks for weapons made of this material.
LanguageData.AK_StuffPower_Armor_Magic.label: 護甲 - 法術
LanguageData.AK_StuffPower_Armor_Magic.description: Armor against sharp damage like bullets, knife stabs, and animal bites.
LanguageData.AK_StuffPower_Armor_Absolute.label: 護甲 - 真實
LanguageData.AK_StuffPower_Armor_Absolute.description: Armor against sharp damage like bullets, knife stabs, and animal bites.
